channel.title: Client runner
channel.description:
Hello.
i really need a client runner that supports java6 update 10. Every time i run.bat on the client it opens with this error [code]Note: Some input files use or override a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: server Press any key to continue . . .[/code] I really think it's the client runner, because i can get on silab, but when i try opening the client to get on it, it opens with a error saying the above. Also alot of runners i've tried say java is not recognized.
Please post the CLIENT runners
Much appriciated

item.title: Client runner
item.dc:creator: @adamp40 adamp40
item.description:
@adamp40 wrote:

I Pk Noobs I:

Rofl, thats a compiler.

Rofl, your wrong

Make sure the number after Xmx is lower thatn your RAM

EG
Xmx16m
would support a mahine with 32mb of ram lol

but dont put too low or the client wont work and crash-- tbh the advice is useless

Read full topic
